job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
     * Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
     * Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
     * Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_details.full_text:
Solutions Engineer

* Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
     * Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
     * Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
     * Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on demonstrating a product (Dataiku), assisting sales, and providing technical guidance to customers. It does not involve core AI/ML engineering tasks such as model development, training, fine-tuning, or productionizing AI systems. The role is primarily customer-facing and sales-support oriented, aligning with the definition of an 'Ambiguous' profile as it is not a technical AI/ML role.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer needs and demonstrating how a product (Dataiku) delivers value, which requires understanding the business context and aligning technical solutions with customer goals.
job_tasks.phrase: prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors

job_tasks.justification: Assisting in sales pipeline building and working with marketing/partners on campaign design indicates involvement in business strategy and go-to-market activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution

job_tasks.justification: Providing technical guidance to a customer's technical team regarding solutions implies a need for understanding and explaining technical aspects of software or platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions

job_tasks.justification: Participating in continuous development activities that expand or build on knowledge and skills with new product releases and enablement sessions suggests a focus on keeping skills updated for product deployment and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions

soft_skills.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action
Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team
working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution
